text: Leonard Maltin (born December 18, 1950) is an American movie critic and historian. He wrote several books on cinema and celebrity biographies. He is known for creating the Walt Disney Treasures collections which is made up of classic Disney cartoons. He was raised in Teaneck, New Jersey. He studied at Teaneck High School and at New York University. He was married to Alice Tlusty since 1975. They have one daughter. In July 2018, Maltin announced that he had been diagnosed with Parkinson's disease in early 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== *Leonard Maltin's official site * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:American historians Category:American journalists Category:American movie critics Category:People with Parkinson's disease Category:People from Teaneck, New Jersey Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:Writers from New York City
